column5: I'm trying to track down a tackle bag  that is waterproof and can hold 3700 series tackle boxes. Cabelas seems to have some nice bags but mixed reviews on waterproof ness. Anyone have one that works for them? Make and model would be great. Thank you.

I just ordered one of These from Bass Pro. I liked the one Solopaddler had on our Attawapiskat trip last spring so I picked one up for this year. I bought the 24"X12"X12" version. Plenty of room for a bunch of 3700 series boxes.
